content: this legal document discusses the division of property between two individuals referred to as mr gana and mr gand the property in question is located in the municipality of castelfidardo and includes an apartment a garage storage room and other common areas the document provides specific details about the cadastral data and cadastral income of each property unit both parties have agreed to divide the property into two shares with mr gana receiving one share and mr gand receiving the other each share is valued at euro 46000 the document also mentions the registration number and collection division of the sale
